I wanted something to wear after I worked out. I also wanted something comfortable yet nice enough for the grocery store, brunch, or a casual walk with a friend. This top is perfect for both needs. It is looser (not fitted) yet not oversized. It can be layered with a long sleeve underneath, paired with a jacket, or worn alone.  I wouldn’t wear this top to workout because I sweat a lot. I need a dry fit shirt and this top is too thick (for my needs) and not the right material (again, for my needs).  I already washed the top once. It did not shrink and the color did not fade. Please note, after reading some of the other reviews about color fading and shrinking, I made sure to not dry it using high heat. I also washed it using cold water.  In terms of a crop top I didn’t want something super choppy because I usually do not show my stomach unless I am at the beach or pool. Therefore, this top, should I want to show a little skin, is perfect for my day to day in that the hem sits an inch below my ribs. *(For context I’m wearing mid-rise pants.)*  For context, I have long legs and a short torso. I’m wearing a medium size. I’m also a fit chick with broad shoulders.
Good quality

评论概述: Great for big butts 🍑 and pear 🍐 shaped people!
评论详情: I already own 3 colors and so I just bought 4 more! 💛💚💙💜🤣 They are one of my favorite workout tops because they are so flattering! I have a big butt, tiny waist, and an average-sized chest. So I like to find tops that stop at my waist to accentuate my smaller waist. And then I like to wear tops that are looser or bigger on top to add volume to my chest to balance out my big butt. That is this top. That’s why I bought more colors! 😀 I have black, white, and cream, and then I bought dark forest, Steelblue, and another white and cream 😜 I will be returning sheer blue because it is more like a green and looks like toothpaste (see pics), and I will be returning storm teal mainly because it was too dark of a color for my complexion and a little too 1980s for me. The cream is more yellow tone than the picture, but is not as yellow tone as my cream shorts that I’m wearing in the picture with it.  I’m a 34B with a 26” waist and the XS fits me great. It’s a little big on top but shrinks a little in the dryer. The bottom of the armpits do stick out just a little. But after a number of washes they didn’t poke out as much. I may take these new ones to my tailor to take them in at the armpits.
Fits great and is a thick comfy material.

I’ve lost close to 40 lbs and wanted to treat myself. This has been on my list for some time now. The color I chose was the orange. I wanted to spice up my workout wardrobe. It’s got a nice thick band at the bottom. Feels well made. Very comfortable and I’m thinking of buying more for sure. Great price too!  UPDATE: a few months later and I still use these shirts. I will admit they do rise up pretty quickly. So if you aren’t not a fan of showing your stomach, these may not be for you. I’m still in my weight loss journey. And find myself using the higher waisted leggings still. But I constantly get compliments still.

I bought true to size (L) thinking it would still be a little baggy like I was hoping, but it was baggy in the stomach and tight in the arms/chest.  That said, I am large chested (DDD) but usually a large will fit okay. The material has little stretch to it, which means it’s made really well, but it made it uncomfortable in my arms.  For the price I would buy it again but I would size up to get the fit and look I was seeking.

评论概述: Fits amazing! So comfy! STYLE AND COMFORT!!
评论详情: Stylish, comfortable, and absolute perfection! Love everything about this! Sits at the perfect spot, not too short, not too long.

Love this shirt. The fabric is thicker and great quality so you don’t have to worry about see through. I found it to be true to size. I have a few other colors in size S and they fit perfect, but I ordered this one in a medium because I wanted this one to be a little looser for the occasion I am wearing it. The waist is form fitting which didn’t cause an issue for me but that’s something to keep in mind when picking size. Also, if you dry it in the dryer, it will shrink a little so be sure to wash and dry dependent on if you want to shrink it slightly or not. Overall I love these tops! Great quality and great fit. If you are in the fence, get it! For reference, I am 138 lbs, 5’8”, 34D. Small for perfect for a more form fitting baggy and Medium was baggy.
the material is thick, but not heavy, and the band around the waist has just enough stretch
